name: This Very Portfolio
description: The first version of my portfolio was built on Wordpress but after seeing how much of a hassle it is to extract data from the database I realized I wanted something leaner. This new portfolio uses AngularJS to feel fast and responsive.

name: iVote
description:
I was part of a three-person team that built iVote, a Ruby on Rails application designed to allow users to register to vote by text message. After texting 'Register' to a shortcode (which interfaces with the application through use of CDYNE's SMS API), users are instructed to provide mailing address information for volunteers to send them voter registration cards.
Local press coverage:
  • Travis County, Texas, Entices Millennials to Register to Vote via Text
  • You Can Now Register to Vote by Text in Travis County
  • Travis Voter Registrar Tests "Text Request"

name: Carewell
description: A student project, Carewell is a Ruby on Rails application designed to manage logistics around the care for elderly family members.

name: Weatherpane
description: This was a quick weekend project Tejas Rawal and I built just for fun. It uses Javascript to grab a user's location coordinates, request weather info for that location and then redirect user to a page with a relevant background for current weather conditions.
